Package model.player

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.player.PlayerBoard
  • public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    The player's personal board containing their damage track, received marks and point value indicator.

      • getMarks

        public java.util.List<DamageToken> getMarks()
        Gets player's received marks. Note that marks are represented as an enemy's damage tokens.
        Returns:
        marks

      • addMark

        public void addMark​(DamageToken d)
        Adds single mark to player board. The maximum amount of marks an enemy player may keep on a player is 3, making it necessary to check occurrences of the colour of a damage token.
        Parameters:
        d - damage token

      • clearMark

        public void clearMark​(Colour c)
        Clears player's received marks of some colour.
        Parameters:
        c - colour
